ValidationRule.description: Field becomes mandatory only when status is on hold. This rule only affects barbados users or FWI users
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status__c , 'On Hold More Info Rqd'), ISPICKVAL(Status__c , 'Customer Hold') ),
ISBLANK(Service_Request_On_Hold__c),
OR( ISPICKVAL($User.Digicel_Country__c , 'FWI'), ISPICKVAL($User.Digicel_Country__c, "Barbados"), $Profile.Name = "System Administrator" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a reason for service request being on hold
